Name: Classes, Courses, and Workshops
Description: Learn how to deepen your meditation and mindful living through one-time classes and multi-class courses.

Name: Community Groups & Events
Description: Community Groups, provide an opportunity for RIM Members to practice Kalyana Mitta, which means "spiritual friendship." These community-led groups complement all other formal RIM programs and connect people who share affinities, study interests, meditation practices, and other dharma-based interests.

Name: Drop-Ins: Open Practice and Learning
Description: Join us for open sessions designed to support your meditation and mindful living practice. These gatherings provide a welcoming space for individuals at all levelsâ€”from beginners exploring mindfulness to experienced practitioners deepening their journey. Whether you're seeking guidance, community, or a moment to reconnect, these sessions are an opportunity to learn, grow, and share in the practice of mindful awareness. Come as you are, and join a community dedicated to living with intention and presence.

Name: Featured Event
Description: These ongoing drop-ins are a cornerstone at RIM, supporting those who are just getting started and those seeking to deepen their learning and practice.

Name: Mindful Movement
Description: Mindful movement is an embodied meditation and mindfulness practice that helps us bring a wise and compassionate awareness to our body, heart, and mind.

Name: Silent Meditation Drop-Ins
Description: Start and end your day with community and silent meditation practice.
